PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Plan is to support with taunt buff/debuffs/Auras and allot of impale stacks, gonna use the dread banner for a 40% chance to impale with 12+APS Duo build will be scion Slayer/Jugg with lancing steel, DW critt? swords
Want to get a reason to drop impale node in champion, do want fortify but impale sounds to good to drop with this kind of "support" build
Ranger CA + Pierce Mule (Lesser Poisen shadow or buy from vendor)
GEMS CA + Pierce + Void Manip
Toxic Rain + Void Manip + Lesser Poisen + Faster Attack Herald of Agony + Faster Attack + Pierce + Damage on full life/Minion Damage
Blood Rage Blink Arrow Hatred + Generosity (Library) CWDT + IC
Scion can buy lesser poisen from act 1 vendor Scion can buy Void manip from act 1 Vendor
Dualist can buy toxic rain from act 1 vendor after brutus
Vendor Recipe
+1 Minion Helm Life Flask + Transmute + Bone spirit Shield = Minion Flask Magic Helm + Minion Flask + Alteration = +1 Helm
Uniq Quiver Normal Quiver + Rare Onyx + Rain of Arrows + 1%Qual + Chance orb
-Pvpu Notes-
-Simply aim for high life gear while leveling and make sure you get as high to plus minion gems helm as you can. I was able to personally Play this build in Hardcore last league with no issues doing T16 maps (other than the guardians/shaper) with all SSF gear including only a plus one minion helm and no lvl 21 HoAG. This build is VERY strong.
-WHILE MAPPING USE PIERCE ON HOAG, SWAP TO VILE TOXINS FOR BOSSING
-Fossil Combo's-
QUIVER (i86 Elder Sharktooth)- Bound-Pristine (the reason you dont attempt to use a corroded is becuse having a res on the quiver is pretty nice QoL)
GLOVES (i86 Elder)- Serrated-Pristine-Corroded (aim for supported by faster attacks and posion)----- Getting these mods allows you to run a dual curse setup to play extra safe for all content
HELMET (i86 Elder)- Bound-Pristine- Lucent (aiming for plus to minion gems, and reduced mana reserved)
